item.title: **strace, lstrace and more**
item.description: strace, ltrace and more Overview Strace is a command line tool for intercepting system calls for tracing the process. This is commonly used by for debugging and understanding the state of the system. How it works command options strace -tttT -p <pid> ///-ttt prints time in epoch // -T prints time spend on each system call The summary information includes the total number of calls, number of calls that failed and the total time spent executing the calls
